ComicInfo.Summary: Ivan's got a message from Hell: Satan's coming to earth, and he's not paying attention to traffic lights or pedestrians. There's only one person who can stop the Devil from bringing Hell to Earth... and it's not necessarily who you think! Before this story is out, three choices will be made, and three fates sealed. Oh, and this time we promise... scrambled eggs will be eaten. BEGINNING A NEW STORY ARC! "The Scabbard" - Part One of Four Now that Ivan's got his message through, there's only one more thing to do... find the one person who can do something with the information... and the sword that comes with it. Together with rebel hellion Cleo, Ivan needs to find the hidden daughter of the Devil before her twin brother finds him. Oh, and we do some more horrible things to the bald guy, too. Can't forget that.
ComicInfo.Title: The Scabbard (Part 1)
